/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass facades reflecting the bright sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with wispy clouds that add a touch of softness to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of looking up at the cityscape.
